caption.p: Monthly rainfall (mm; in blue) and mean temperature in the air (°C; in red) recorded between 2012 and 2019 in Vientiane Capital (17°58′12″ N, 102°34′14″ E). Number of Aedes aegypti and Aedes albopictus adult mosquitoes collected monthly between 2016 and 2019 in Vientiane Capital (in black).
